name: Glitch (itch) (Dice_King, Fasith)
description:
Glitch - a puzzle game. Your goal is to combine two forms and complete the level...

Credits: Our discords: Unity devs: Dice#9262, Fa710, The grates music designer: lashman#0597 and Amazing artist: Znimator#5555

Input: z - switch between forms, x - swap them, Esc - menu, e - interact
